pkgmetadata.longdescription: Two-/Three-Stage Designs for Phase 12 Clinical Trials // Calculate optimal Zhong's two-/three-stage Phase II designs (see Zhong (2012) doi:10.1016/j.cct.2012.07.006). Generate Target Toxicity decision table for Phase I dose-finding (two -/three-stage). This package also allows users to run dose- finding simulations based on customized decision table.
